questions.question: Which of the following in NOT part of SMS's Digital Citizenship Agreement?

choices.answer: I will not change desktop settings and displays including cursors.
I will always log off before leaving a computer.
I will not play games on the school ipad without  teacher instruction
I will only share my passwords with my  closest friends.

questions.question: It is okay to take selfies for fun with your school iPad.
It is okay if I buffer Youtube videos at home to watch in school.
It is okay if I download movies from torrent sites to my iPad.
It is okay for me to create a shared Google Doc to share answers and chat with friends.
I should update my iOS as soon as a new update becomes available.
I only have to pay half-price for a broken ipad for the first break - after that I have to pay full price.
I have to return the exact power adapter and charging cable I was given by GNPS.
I can use a non-MFI (Made for iPad) charger for my iPad (especially if it charges at a faster pace).
If I don't have access to my iPad, I can still complete my homework.
Which of the following is NOT true if you don't have access to your iPad?

choices.answer: I can submit my homework via GC on a computer
I can submit my homework via GC on an Internet-connected phone
I cannot complete or submit my homework
I can use pen/pencil and paper to submit my homework

questions.question: I am allowed to use my own iPad case.
Which of the following must you do to backup your notes in Notability?

choices.answer: Tap on the Settings tab within Notability
Tap on Auto-backup and log in with your Google ID
Tap on and make sure iCloud syncing is on
Change the auto-backup file format from .NOTE to .PDF

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a super password requirement?

choices.answer: Must include at least one upper case
May not contain multiple identical consecutive characters

questions.question: Which of the following would never be considered plagiarism/cheating?

choices.answer: Paraphrasing someone else's work without providing a citation.
Copying word for word from a source and providing a citation.
Using Google Translate to complete a foreign language assignment.

questions.question: Allowing a partner or group member to complete all of the work for an assignment is not considering cheating.
Where should you go for help in locating a misplaced iPad during the day?
